eas_text: A civil authority has issued A SHELTER IN PLACE WARNING for the following counties or areas: Dorchester, SC; at 08:58 AM ON JAN 10, 2026 Effective until 01:58 PM. Message from WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: Shelter in place! There is an active incident in the area of 2450 W 5th North St. Avoid the area. Use alternative routes if traveling.
